Package edu.cwru.sepia.agent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    The base type for any agent that can interact with the Sepia environment.
    AgentLogTest  
    BasicGatheringCoordinator
    A basic AI that does simple commanding of gatherer units
    BusynessCoordinator
    A simple container for two lists: units that are doing something and units that aren't.
    CombatAgent  
    CombatAgentDuelTest  
    MatlabAgent
    This is a wrapper class for calling agent implemented in Matlab.
    MimicAgent
    An agent that uses a map of turn numbers to action assignments to replay a series of actions.
    PrimitiveAttackCoordinator
    A class that offers primitive micromanagement of soldiers Just sends them to the nearest building, shooting anything in range
    ResourceCollectionAgent
    This agent will first collect gold to produce a peasant, then the two peasants will collect gold and wood separately until reach goal.
    ScriptedGoalAgent
    An agent based around the concept of build orders.
    ScriptedGoalAgent.Goal
    The goal and the means for achieving it.
    ScriptedGoalAgentTest  
    SimpleAgent1
    A simple agent that makes all its units move in random directions if they are not attacking.
    SimpleAgent2  
    ThreadIntermediary
    An intermediary allowing for the trading of states and actions between the agent and the environment.
    ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch
    A simple structure allowing the return of the current state/history and a latch that indicates when the next state will be ready.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ThreadIntermediary.StateType
